subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Beatty, who plays the pivotal left tackle position and was one of the Giants’ most experienced linemen, tore a pectoral muscle during weight training and will be sidelined five to six months.
snippet: Beatty, who plays the pivotal left tackle position and was one of the Giants’ most experienced linemen, tore a pectoral muscle during weight training and will be sidelined five to six months.
